author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Can you add
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot?

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/glwagner/OceanTurb.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- c70005b0-7c0c-11e9-83f0-e1aaf5c2af27 -->
